name: HyperMarket Power
description:
You are a customer at a hypermarket and must quickly buy items that fall under the required amount of items and the budget you get.

A submission for the Trijam #172! This was done in 3 hours so expect this game to not be so bueno. It was also done all by myself, and a single used asset.

I would like to let the people who play this ahead of time that there will be a point where the game will break, and the budget and the required amount of items will not match with what is on the screen. Unfortunately the best way to fix it is just restart the game entirely by refreshing your browser.

Used Asset:
BG Music - Action RPG Free Music

https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/27795

If you want to see the process (speedrun) of this game, check out my stream video.
